basic.description: This course covers classical equilibrium thermodynamics; first and second law, entropy, phase changes, potentials. Physics of moist air; physics of aerosols; condensation of water vapor on aerosols. Microphysics and dynamics of clouds; growth of ice crystals.
basic.subject: MET
basic.title: Atmospheric Physics I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAC 2313 ("C-"or better), MET 2700 ("C" or better), PHY 2048C ("C-" or better), and PHY 2049C ("C-" or better).
